DOC.brief_summary: This randomise control study involve group 20 patients- 10 patient control group , 10 patient treatment group . The treatment group consist exercise theraband shoulder exercise motor control scapula . The purpose study measure effect pre-operative physiotherapy program patient awaitng rotator cuff surgery , The duration pilot project 4 week .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Pre-operative Exercise Program Patients With Full Thickness Rotator Cuff Tear Waiting Surgical Repair
DOC.detailed_description: This study take place genral hospital use wait list orthopedic surgery department- patient awaitng rotator cuff surgery include . randomise process block use . There 2 group patient active comparator intervention . All patient begin project 4 weks evaluation range motion , strength , acromial humeral mesurement do ultrasound questionnaire pain ( DASH ) quality life ( WORC ) . At 8 week patient fill 2 questionnaire DASH WORC .
